document_title: Comprehensive CEO Dashboard Gap Analysis & Integration Roadmap
objective: To transform the CEO Dashboard from a static partial view into a real-time Aggregation Layer that strictly mirrors the data from Staff, Manager, and Accountant sub-modules.
user_critical_focus: Ensure no 'Tables' or features are missed from the main overview.

audit_findings.gap: Granularity. CEO sees the *Count*, Manager sees the *People*.
audit_findings.resolution: Approved. CEO needs the pulse (95%), not the micro-list of 150 names unless drilling down.
audit_findings.action_item: Keep 'HumanResources' but ensure the 'View All' link redirects to `/hcm` or `/manager` for the full list.

audit_findings.ceo_view: FinanceSnapshot (Cash Position, AR, AP, Net Margin).
audit_findings.gap: None. The new 'FinanceSnapshot' widget perfectly mirrors the top-level accountant view.

audit_findings.manager_view: ProductionLineStatus (Focuses on *Physical Lines* status: Running, Down, Delayed).
audit_findings.gap: MISMATCH. The User explicitly requested 'Physical Stations' to be shown. The current CEO view lists 'Orders' (PO-123) but hides the 'Machine Status' (Line 1 Down) inside summary text or KPIs.
audit_findings.resolution: SWAP or ADD. The CEO Dashboard must display the 'ProductionLineStatus' (Physical Stations) component instead of, or alongside, the Order Timeline.
audit_findings.recommendation: Replace 'ProductionPlanning' with 'ProductionLineStatus' in the main grid to give the 'God Mode' view of physical assets.

audit_findings.gap: None. The new 'ExecutiveAlerts' component mirrors the high-priority items.

final_execution_plan.reason: To satisfy the 'Physical Stations' visibility requirement.
